alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 4:56PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A moderate band of snow will impact Fergus and portions of eastern Judith Basin Counties through 545 PM MST... At 452 PM MST, A moderate band of snow were reported along a line extending from 7 miles east of Belt to near Winifred. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Brief period of moderate snow and winds up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Satellite and webcams. IMPACT...Variable visibility down to a half mile or less and slippery roads could result in hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Stanford, Denton, Hobson, Winifred, Moore, Windham, Forestgrove, Moccasin, Ackley Lake State Park, Glengarry, Utica, Garneill, Danvers, Coffee Creek, Suffolk, Giltedge, Judith Landing, Hilger and Heath. This includes the following highways... Highway 200 between mile markers 29 and 108. Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 2, and between mile markers 1 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
